channel.title: How do i get my monsters to die?
channel.description: how do i get my monsters to die? i attack them, they get low health then it shoots higher than it was originally

item.title: How do i get my monsters to die?
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

look in your npcs .CFG
And press CTRL+F then look for the npc’s name you want to change the the hit points of
then once you get to it’s name it’ll look similar to this

npc = Id	npcname				0	0

npc = Id npcname —> 0 this zeros changes the level _–> 0 this zero changes the hitpoints change it to the amount of health you wnat ur monster to have

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get my monsters to die?
